item.title: Painless GraphQL File Uploads With Apollo Server to Amazon S3 and Local Filesystem
item.description: This tutorial-like article will demonstrate how to handle file uploads on Apollo Server and stream them to Amazon S3 or, optionally (but not preferably), to your server’s filesystem. Before we go on, I assume you have basic familiarity with S3 and already have read on this subject on the Apollo docs. NOTE: for the sake of simplicity, I have kept things to a very minimum (most of the time).
